channel.title: spellbook on Morgan Mayday
channel.description: Recent content in spellbook on Morgan Mayday

item.title: A Gate, of Sorts.
item.description:
so you’ve talked, to that mage you know, and it’s told you the outline of things, spoken of skills and tools and metaphors for horrible things and useful things. and you get it, or at least you mostly do.

and that mage you know, you’ve asked it questions, and it’s told you near-answers and hedged its words, and told you that it can’t tell you everything, and that’s fine, language has a limit, but you do want to learn more. so you ask, of course, because it encourages questions.
